content: At the top, you'll find lots of Frozen Corpses to smash apart, as well as a Thunder Rhino Master and two Frozen Corpses guarding a **Treasure Chest** at the foot of a giant stone pillar that overlooks the path you took to get up here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
At the top, you'll find lots of Frozen Corpses to smash apart, as well as a Thunder Rhino Master and two Frozen Corpses guarding a **Treasure Chest** at the foot of a giant stone pillar that overlooks the path you took to get up here.
